title: EXCLUSIVE: Native iMessage for Android - No Apple ID Needed!
description:
Goodbye, green bubbles... iMessage has been completely reverse engineered bringing _native_ support to Android! This isn't like Nothing Chats or AirMessage, it's the first truly *real* iMessage experience—without compromise.

Download Beeper Mini - https://snazzy.fm/cS
Try pypush - https://snazzy.fm/xQ
iMessage, explained - https://snazzy.fm/TK
How Beeper Mini works - https://snazzy.fm/Lb
Buy the OnePlus 11 (affiliated) - https://snazzy.fm/Of
Buy the Galaxy Fold5 (affiliated) - https://snazzy.fm/ic
Purchase anything Apple - https://snazzy.fm/MA 

Follow Snazzy Labs on Twitter - http://twitter.com/snazzylabs
Follow me on Instagram - http://instagram.com/snazzyq

A new app called Beeper Mini claims to seamlessly integrate iMessage functionality on Android devices, potentially revolutionizing cross-platform messaging. Developed from the open-source project pypush by a high school student and supported by Pebble founder Eric Migicovsky, this app promises secure and direct messaging witho
